meanings.definition: A plant of the pea family with clusters of blue flowers.
meanings.sent1: The field was filled with beautiful bluebonnets.
meanings.sent2: Texans love to admire the bluebonnets in spring.
meanings.sent3: The bluebonnets in the garden seemed to be gossiping with the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like bluebonnets in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bluebonnets swayed gently in the breeze, a serene sight.

meanings.definition: A blue-flowered lupine plant native to Texas.
meanings.sent1: The bluebonnets added a pop of color to the Texan landscape.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists visit Texas to see the famous bluebonnets.
meanings.sent3: The bluebonnets in the field were having a party, inviting all the bees.
meanings.sent4: His tie was as vibrant as a field of bluebonnets.
meanings.sent5: The bluebonnets painted the countryside in shades of blue.
